abstract.t: This document specifies the use of Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP) as a transport medium for the Certificate Management Protocol Version 2 (CMPv2) and Lightweight CMP Profile [Lightweight-CMP-Profile] CMPv2 defines the interaction between various PKI entities for the purpose of certificate creation and management. CoAP is an HTTP like client-server protocol used by various constrained devices in IoT space.
